label: Appa
quoteText: I guess this means we'll always be together.
quoteAttribution: Aang to Appa

label: Azula
quoteText: Well what choice do I have? Trust is for fools! Fear is the only reliable way. Even you fear me.
quoteAttribution: Azula to a hallucination of her mother

label: Iroh
quoteText: After I reconquer Ba Sing Se, I'm going to reconquer my tea shop, and I'm going to play Pai Sho every day!
quoteAttribution: Iroh to Team Avatar

label: Katara
quoteText: I will never, ever turn my back on people who need me!
quoteAttribution: Katara asserting her protective nature to Sokka

label: Momo
quoteText: Someone's missing from your group, someone very important ... Where's Momo?
quoteAttribution: Bumi to Team Avatar

label: Ozai
quoteText: What I'm trying to say is -- There is no right or wrong apart from what you decide. Whom you choose to defend deserves to be defended simply because you chose them. You are the Fire Lord. What you choose, by definition, is right.
quoteAttribution: Ozai explaining his views about being Fire Lord to Zuko

label: Sokka
quoteText: That's all I got. It's pretty much my whole identity. Sokka, the meat and sarcasm guy.
quoteAttribution: Sokka to the universe after getting trapped in a small fissure

label: Toph Beifong
quoteText: I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!
quoteAttribution: Toph to Xin Fu and Yu

label: Zuko
quoteText: I used to think this scar marked me â€“ the mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.
quoteAttribution: Zuko to Katara

label: Amon
quoteText: The era of bending is over! A new era of equality has begun!
quoteAttribution: Amon giving a speech during the "Revelation" rally

label: Asami Sato
quoteText: It's all right. People usually assume that I'm daddy's helpless little girl, but I can handle myself.
quoteAttribution: Asami accepting Korra's apology

label: Bolin
quoteText: Maybe I just can't turn my back on people when they're down!
quoteAttribution: Bolin to Mako

label: Bumi
quoteText: I've tried my best to keep the world safe. Hope I made you proud.
quoteAttribution: Bumi to a statue of his father

label: Iknik Blackstone Varrick
quoteText: Yep, I like to think I'm always there to stand up for the little guy. Especially if that little guy can help this guy become a bigger guy.
quoteAttribution: Varrick explaining his buying of a controlling interest in Future Industries to Mako

label: Jinora
quoteText: The world's in trouble ... I have to go help.
quoteAttribution: Jinora to Tenzin

label: Korra
quoteText: No matter what happens, no matter how crazy things get, I'll always try to restore balance.
quoteAttribution: Korra about her duty as the Avatar to Asami and Tenzin

label: Kuvira
quoteText: I was cast aside by my own parents like I meant nothing to them! How could I just stand by and watch the same thing happen to my nation when it needed someone to guide it?
quoteAttribution: Kuvira explaining to Korra why she usurped power in the Earth Kingdom

label: Kya
quoteText: You think you're the responsible one? Where were you after Dad died and Mom was all alone? Because I was the only one who packed up and moved my whole life to be with her.
quoteAttribution: Kya to Tenzin

label: Lin Beifong
quoteText: When I was younger, all I wanted to do was please my mother. I became a police chief because I thought it would make her happy ... but it didn't. You need to make decisions based on what you want. Don't make the same mistakes I did.
quoteAttribution: Lin to Opal

label: Mako
quoteText: I did what I had to do to survive and protect my little brother.
quoteAttribution: Mako explaining his past to Korra

label: Naga
quoteText: My best friend. And a great tracker.
quoteAttribution: Korra to Mako about Naga

label: Pabu
quoteText: See? Pabu's not just a one trick poodle pony.
quoteAttribution: Bolin to Mako and Korra about Pabu

label: Suyin Beifong
quoteText: It took me a while, but I finally realized what I was looking for was a family. So I bought this plot of land, found a brilliant architect who later became my husband, and created a place I could truly call home.
quoteAttribution: Suyin to Korra

label: Tarrlok
quoteText: That's what I admire about you, Korra. Your willingness to go to extremes in order to get what you want. It is a quality we both share.
quoteAttribution: Tarrlok to Korra

label: Tenzin
quoteText: I am not a reflection of my father. I am Tenzin.
quoteAttribution: Tenzin finding his spiritual enlightenment

label: Tonraq
quoteText: I was protecting you from the shame I brought on the family.
quoteAttribution: Tonraq explaining the reason for his secrecy to Korra

label: Unalaq
quoteText: You think what Avatar Wan did was good? Driving almost all the spirits from this world? The Avatar hasn't brought balance, only chaos. You call yourself the bridge between the two worlds, but there shouldn't be a bridge; we should live together as one.
quoteAttribution: Unalaq to Korra

label: Zaheer
quoteText: The idea of having nations and governments is as foolish as keeping the human and spirit realms separate. You've had to deal with a moronic president and a tyrannical queen. Don't you think the world would be better off if leaders like them were eliminated?
quoteAttribution: Zaheer explaining his ideals to Korra
